oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interview with ‘Āʼishah al-Imām
مقابلة مع عائشة الإمام
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633--Songs and music
Muḥammad, Prophet, 571-633--Biography
oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Abraha; Abraham (Biblical patriarch); Āminah bint Wahb, -approximately 575; Gabriel (Archangel); Ḥadīth; Ishmael (Biblical figure); Joseph (Son of Jacob); ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim, approximately 500-579; ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, 600-661?; ʻĪd al-Mawlid al-Nabawī; Adam, (Biblical figure); Āminah bint Wahb, -approximately 575; Eve (Biblical figure); God; Pregnancies; Prophecy; Songs; ʻĪd al-Mawlid al-Nabawī; Āminah bint Wahb, -approximately 575; Āsiya, wife of Pharaoh; Biography of Prophet Muḥammad; Birds; Childbirth; Eve (Biblical figure); Maiden; Mary, Blessed Virgin, Saint; ʻĪd al-Mawlid al-Nabawī; Āminah bint Wahb, -approximately 575; Breastfeeding; Childbirth; Death; Grandfathers; Mothers; Praise of Muḥammad; Prophethood; Shepherds; ʻAbd al-Muṭṭalib ibn Hāshim, approximately 500-579; Praise of Muḥammad; ʻĪd al-Mawlid al-Nabawī
oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded in 1996 with ‘Āʼishah al-Amām, female, born in 1936 in Akka, Palestine and resides in al-Baddāwī Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع عائشة الأمام عام 1996، أنثى، ولدت عام 1936 في عكا، فلسطين وتقيم في مخيم البداوي للاجئين الفلسطينين، لبنان.
